name: Desert Adventure (GrishaPetrovich)
description:
Link to game: https://www.yahaha.com/app/spaces/274895420165

Instructions

---------------

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Left Mouse - Shoot (you can shoot with coconuts)

Objective 

---------------

Kill 10 crocodiles as quickly as possible. 

Crocodiles are faster than you so be careful,

but there are cars on the map that will help you escape!
